news.title: Brazil orders Meta to suspend policy banning third-party AI chatbots from WhatsApp
news.summary: Brazil's competition watchdog has ordered WhatsApp to put on hold its policy that bars third-party AI companies from using its business API to offer chatbots on the app. The agency has also started an investigation against the company to determine if the policy is anti-competitive.

news.title: Converge Bio raises $25M, backed by Bessemer and execs from Meta, OpenAI, Wiz
news.summary: AI drug discovery startup Converge Bio raised $25 million in a Series A led by Bessemer Venture Partners, with additional backing from executives at Meta, OpenAI, and Wiz.

news.title: Meta-backed Hupo finds growth after pivot to AI sales coaching from mental wellness
news.summary: Hupo, backed by Meta, pivoted from mental wellness to AI sales coaching for banks and insurers, and secured a $10M Series A led by DST Global

news.title: More than 100 new tech unicorns were minted in 2025 — here they are
news.summary: Using data from Crunchbase and PitchBook, TechCrunch tracked down the VC-backed startups that became unicorns so far this year.

news.title: OpenAI buys tiny health records startup Torch for, reportedly, $100M
news.summary: AI health records startup Torch will be using its tech for OpenAI's new ChatGPT Health, according to co-founder Ilya Abyzov.

news.title: Microsoft is retiring its Office Lens app on iOS and Android
news.summary: Microsoft is removing its Lens scanner app from iOS and Android in the coming months. Microsoft Lens, or Office Lens as it's known to most, will no longer be supported on February 9th, and the app won't be functional after March 9th. news.title: The best robot vacuums we’ve tested for 2026
news.summary: Robot vacuums are impressive devices that will clean your floors well and — thanks to bigger batteries and better robot brains — rarely get tired of doing their job. news.title: Fired Rockstar employees’ plea for interim pay denied
news.summary: A UK employment tribunal rejected a request from fired Rockstar Games employees to receive interim pay while waiting for a full hearing about their dismissal, according to Bloomberg and IGN. news.title: Framework hikes desktop PC prices as RAM shortage drags on
news.summary: Just weeks after raising the price of its RAM modules, Framework has announced that it's also increasing the price of its desktop PC in response to the global memory shortage. news.title: Meta plans to lay off hundreds of metaverse employees this week
news.summary: Meta's Reality Labs team is expected to lose around 10 percent of its staff, with layoffs concentrated on the division's metaverse employees, as reported by The New York Times. news.title: Anthropic launches Cowork, a Claude Code-like for general computing
news.summary: Users can give Claude access to a folder and tell it what to do for them.

news.title: Paramount sues WBD over Netflix deal. WBD says Paramount’s price is still inadequate.
news.summary: WBD calls Paramount's lawsuit "meritless" and its offer deficient.

news.title: Verizon to stop automatic unlocking of phones as FCC ends 60-day unlock rule
news.summary: FCC waives rule that forced Verizon to unlock phones 60 days after activation.

news.summary: The LinkedIn cofounder and frequent Trump target has a simple message for his peers: “Just speak up about the things that you think are true.”

news.title: What to Do If ICE Invades Your Neighborhood
news.summary: With federal agents storming the streets of American communities, there’s no single right way to approach this dangerous moment. But there are steps you can take to stay safe—and have an impact.
